addr: 8302 Melrose Avenue. Unit A (look for our yellow awning). Los Angeles, CA 90048
title: Christmas Present Cake Class - Chocolate
desc: Join Charm City Cakes decorator and Food Network 'Cake Masters' cast member Alyssa as she walks you through the steps in creating this sparkly holiday present cake. Students will each receive their own pre-baked 6" chocolate cake filled and crumb coated with vanilla buttercream and covered with vanilla fondant. Students will learn  Ages 8 & up. Sunday December 13th 2015. $140 per participant.
